author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
Integrate in the menu the following updates (up to /dev/CMSSW_7_3_0/HLT/V80):
- Fix a couple of prescales
- New strip CPE configuration (only for 25ns menu), CMSHLT-228
- New relaxed tau+MET trigger for 7e33 menu, CMSHLT-226
- Changing the placehoder L1 seed to the real one for Electron+HT cross trigger, CMSHLT-233
- Migration electron legs of tau paths to WP75, CMSHLT-232
- Update cuts and names for single photon paths, CMSHLT-230
title: Further updates to the Run2 HLT menu
